name: Evolution Pakistan Outsourcing Group
overview:
Evolution Pakistan Outsourcing Group is a leading business outsourcing solutions provider that helps mid-sized organizations, established corporations & entrepreneurial ventures in Pakistan & Gulf. We encompasses a huge repository of business process outsourcing expertise that includes but is not limited to the customized development of robust project outsourcing, Products management solutions, Offshore outsourced services and high level of compliances.

We actually put ourselves in your assignments, screening the project from your perspective, understanding your targets and helping you achieving goals, and then employing our expertise in developing a solution that is sustainable, scalable and cost effective. Evolution Pakistan has partners across Pakistan Including Manufacturers, Suppliers, Vendors, Services Providers which means that we are extremely comfortable working across different challenging responsibilities.
